title: Beautiful 2 Bedroom, Natural Light, Hardwood Floors, AVL 7/1, D4
posting_body: ['Enjoy quiet neighborhood living in a small, intimate building centrally located in south Berkeley between Telegraph and Shattuck.', 'SCHEDULE A TOUR TODAY: <URL>', 'KEY FEATURES', 'Parking: Off Street (See Details Below)', 'Lease Duration: 07/01/2022 - 05/31/2023', 'Pets Policy: Pets Under 80 lbs Welcome (See Details Below)', 'Laundry: Shared, Coin Operated', 'Floor: 2nd', 'Property Type: Apartment', 'RENTAL FEATURES', 'Living room', 'Range / Oven', 'Refrigerator', 'Cable-ready', 'Hardwood floor', 'Tile floor', 'BUILDING FEATURES', 'Shared Coin-Operated Laundry', 'Seismically Retrofit', 'Bike Room', 'Off-Street/Carport Parking available for additional fee.', 'LEASE TERMS', 'Pet Friendly: Pets under 80lbs allowed at $75/mo per pet added to the base rent.', 'Utilities: Residents pay all.', 'Smoking is not permitted on the premises.']
